name: Glacierbound
description:
Created by HomeTeam GameDev - https://gamkedo.itch.io/

Controls:

WASD: Movement

LMB / E: Fire

Space: Activate Door

1: Activate Health Pack

2: Activate Armor

3: Activate Damage Boost Item 1

4: Activate Damage Boost Item 2

[ or ]: Adjust Music Volume

P: Pause
